author: William Aung Leyraud
comment: One of my favorite watch faces, it's straight to the point, no added bells and whistles that will drain your battery, 5 stars! I'd only add optional color schemes and it'd be 6 stars. What I like the most is that this watch face got design done right, not like other generic ones, this looks a real fashionable time piece.
title: Straight to the point watch face!

author: Jim Thibault
comment: Looks Nice do not need the battery gauges though
title: Looks Nice
